ANGULAR UI COMPONENTS FRAMEWORK

Installation

Using npm or yarn to install package:

npm install @ui-vts/ng-vts
//or
yarn install @ui-vts/ng-vts

Theme:

Single theme usage:

Import theme stylesheet (support LESS and CSS, use one):

// Import one of themes provided:
// Using CSS
@import "@ui-vts/theme/ui-vts.css";       // Default theme
@import "@ui-vts/theme/theme-dark.css";   // Import other theme by format 'theme-<name>.css'

// Using LESS
@import "@ui-vts/theme/ui-vts.less";      // Default theme
@import "@ui-vts/theme/theme-dark.less";  // Import other theme by format 'theme-<name>.less'
Multiple theme usage:

Provide prebuilt themes of @ui-vts/theme or provide built stylesheets inside angular.json

To provide themes of @ui-vts/theme

// Provide prebuilt CSS inside assets
// angular.json: projects > architect > (build | serve) > options > assets (Add an entry inside assets list) 
{
    "glob": "**/(*.css|*.woff|*.woff2)",
    "input": "./node_modules/@ui-vts/theme/",
    "output": "/assets/themes/"
}

To provide built stylesheets:

// styles/default.less
@import "@ui-vts/theme/ui-vts.less";

// styles/dark.less
@import "@ui-vts/theme/theme-dark.less";

// angular.json: projects > architect > build > options > styles
"styles": [
    {
        "input": "styles/default.less",
        "bundleName": "default",
        "inject": false
    },
    {
        "input": "styles/dark.less",
        "bundleName": "dark",
        "inject": false
    }
]

Provide theme service inside App Module

import { VtsThemeModule, VtsTheme } from '@ui-vts/theme/services'

@NgModule({
    declarations: [],
    imports: [
        VtsThemeModule.forRoot({
            themes: [
                {
                    theme: 'dark',         // VtsTheme
                    url: '/assets/themes/theme-dark.css'
                    // url: '/dark.css'    // If using built stylesheets

                },
                {
                    theme: 'default',      // VtsTheme
                    url: '/assets/themes/theme-default.css'
                    // url: '/default.css' // If using built stylesheets
                },
            ],
            defaultTheme: 'default'
        }),
        ...
    ]
})

Using service to fetch available themes and switching theme:

import { VtsTheme, VtsThemeItem, VtsThemeService } from '@ui-vts/theme/services';

// .ts
allThemes: VtsThemeItem[] = []
currentTheme: VtsTheme | null = null

constructor(
    private themeService: VtsThemeService
) {
    this.themeService.allTheme$.subscribe(d => this.allThemes = d)
    this.themeService.theme$.subscribe(d => this.currentTheme = d)
}

onThemeChange(e: VtsThemeItem) {
    this.themeService.setTheme(e.theme)
}

// .html
<ul>
    <li 
        *ngFor="let item of allThemes" 
        [class.selected]="currentTheme === item.theme" 
        (click)="onThemeChange(item)"
    >{{ item.theme | titlecase }}</li>
</ul>

Animation:

Import BrowserAnimationsModule or NoopAnimationsModule for some components which require transition animation:

import { BrowserAnimationsModule, NoopAnimationsModule } from '@angular/platform-browser/animations';

@NgModule({
    declarations: [],
    imports: [
        BrowserAnimationsModule,
        //or
        //NoopAnimationsModule,
        ...
    ]
})

Usage & Detail:

Importing module relatively in project's feature modules and using components (Check component's document for more detail):

@NgModule({
    declarations: [],
    imports: [
        VtsSelectModule,
        ...
    ]
})
